department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The contract is for Storage Metal Plate Racks
full_summary:
================================				
_W3555-244439 - Storage Metal Plate Racks_
================================				
				
**Bid Details:**
---------------

*   **Bid Number:** W3555-244439
*   **Contract Title:** Storage Metal Plate Racks
*   **Reference Number:** WS4464207938
*   **Procurement Category:** GD (Goods and Services)
*   **Bid Solicitation Number:** WS4464207938
*   **Publication Date:** March 20, 2024
*   **Bid Closing Date:** April 17, 2024, 2:00 PM EST (Local Time)
*   **Bid Status:** Expired


**Bid Opportunities:**
-----------------------

This bid is for a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Storage Metal Plate Racks. The successful bidder will be awarded a contract with the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), for storage of panel systems in British Columbia.


**Trade Agreements:**
---------------------

The following trade agreements apply to this bid:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)


**Bid Contact Information:**
---------------------------

If you have any questions or concerns with regards to this bid, please contact:

Cress, Christine (SPAC/PSPC)
christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca


**Bid Documents:**
-------------------

For the purpose of this bid, there are no attachments and documents have been provided.

-------------------------

To submit your bid, follow these steps:

1.  Register as a supplier to obtain a supplier ID (as applicable)
2.  Obtain the applicable documents by visiting the notice URL provided
